Book and Photo Exhibition and Film Show Held
articles.content:
Book and Photo Exhibition and Film Show Held 
    Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A book and photo exhibition and a film show were held at the Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition on Oct. 12 for the delegations of the Russian Youth Association for the Study of the Songun Politics, the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for the Independent Development, the Polish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Group of Kinshasa University of Democratic Congo for the Study of the Juche Idea participating in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 The members of the delegations went round with keen interest the photos showing the undying feats President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il have performed for the last 60 years by developing the WPK into an invincible party which has fully ensured the monolithic idea and established the unitary leadership and is strong in organization and discipline and a veteran and tested party unequivocally supported and trusted by the people.
 They looked round famous works of Kim Il Sung and  Kim Jong Il and books introducing the politics, economy, culture and history of the DPRK before watching a Korean documentary film "Respected Comrade Kim Jong Il Is Great Thinker and Theoretician".

articles.title: Officials of Youth Organizations of DPRK and China Meet
articles.content:
Officials of Youth Organizations of DPRK and China Meet 
    Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A meeting of officials of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and the members of the Beijing Municipal youth delegation of China was held on Oct. 12.
 Present there were Kang Kwang Chol, secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the youth league, and other youth league officials in Pyongyang and members of the youth delegation of Beijing Municipality headed by Wang Minghao, first deputy secretary of the Beijing Municipal Committee of the Communist Youth League of China.    
 The participants in the meeting informed each other of the activities of their youth organizations and exchanged their achievements and experience, deepening the friendship.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Forces' Anti-National, Anti-Reunification Moves under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Forces' Anti-National, Anti-Reunification Moves under Fire 
    Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The preparatory committee of the South Chungchong Provincial Solidarity for the Implementation of the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea reportedly issued a statement on Oct. 8 denouncing the conservative forces including the Grand National Party for their moves against the nation and reunification.
 The GNP, a group of pro-U.S. sycophantic treacherous forces, is again talking about a "special inspection of remittance to the north" in a bid to lay obstacles in the way of independence, peace and reunification paved by the Korean nation itself and the security authorities are resorting to a wholesale suppression of people on charges of violation of the "National Security Law", an anti-reunification law, the statement said, and went on:
 Not content with taking issue with the inter-Korean reunification functions conducive to great national unity, labeling them "pro-north", they are standing in the way of even the cooperation and exchange for the common interests and prosperity of the nation.    
 The statement urged the GNP and the conservative forces to stop at once the treacherous acts of blocking peace and reunification quite contrary to the wishes of the nation.

Former Indonesian President and Her Party Arrive
articles.content:
Former Indonesian President and Her Party Arrive
    Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Former President  Megawati Soekarnoputri, general chairwoman of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, and her party arrived here today to visit the Democratic People's Republic of Korea  to congratulate the WPK on its 60th birthday. 
 They were greeted at the airport by Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other officials concerned and Bambang Irawan Kromodimuljo, charge d' affaires ad interim of the Indonesian embassy here, and its staff members.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Congolese Party Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Congolese Party Delegation
    Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday met and had a friendly talk with a delegation of the Congolese Party of Labour led by Mbeh Hubert, member of the Central Committee of the CPL, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.
 Present there were officials of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea.    
 On the occasion the head of the delegation said that the friendly relations between the two parties and two countries are growing strong under the deep care of leader Kim Jong Il, adding that the socialist cause of Korea led by him will be sure to win.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Former Indonesian President and Her Party
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Former Indonesian President and Her Party
    Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly conversation with former Indonesian President Megawati Soekarnoputri, general chairwoman of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, and her party who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Oct. 13.
 On hand were Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other officials concerned, Indonesian Charge d' Affaires Bambang Irawan Kromodimuljo and staff members of the Indonesian embassy here.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Il from Foreign Delegations
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Il from Foreign Delegations
    Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Central Committee of the Congolese Party of Labor on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 The gift was handed over to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Oct. 13 by visiting Mbeh Hubert, member of the Central Committee of the Congolese Party of Labor who is leading the party delegation.    
 Kim Jong Il was also presented with gifts from the Communist Youth Union of Canada (Marxist-Leninist), the Beijing Municipal Committee of the Communist Youth League of China and the delegation of the Zaoyuan Fish Breeding Company of China.
